articles.author: Tumaini Carayol
articles.title: Djokovic 'raising tensions' of Serbia and Kosovo after French Open statement - The Guardian
articles.description: The Kosova Tennis Federation has responded to Novak Djokovic’s comments but it is unlikely the world No 3 will face punishment by the ATP
articles.content:
The Kosova Tennis Federation has accused Novak Djokovic of contributing to the rising tensions between Serbia and Kosovo following his statements at the French Open on Monday.
After Djokovics straig… [+9751 chars]
